front.title: MCI(Multicast Channel Identifier) DNS RR type for the support of SSM(Source Specific Multicast)

abstract.t: This document proposes the use of the new DNS RR type MCI (Multicast Channel Identifier), as it is specifying SSM (Source Specific Multicast) multicast channel [SSM] as a DNS Resource Record. It shall allow the advance multicast session advertisement by providing the dynamic mapping between SSM multicast channel and MCI.
